title: ID this Ultra Thin Slab Serif
content:
Almost reminds me of an ultra thin modified Rockwell ... anyone know of this typeface?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091439im_/http:/typophile.com/files/slabserif_3444.jpg)
author: moggy

comments.content:
Angel how do find these things out?!!!! Your amazing!

Mikey :-)
Looks like Avant Garde with serifs tacked on.
